banner_description:
CONUN is a blockchain-based decentralized storage network.
It is a service platform that collects world wide storage by
sharing the idle resources of the participants' personal computers.
mainnet_description: CONUN's Cross-Chain Swap allows transactions to exchange one cryptocurrency for another.
ocean_drive_subtitle:
Explore, Share,
and Earn with OceanDrive
ocean_drive_description: OceanDrive is a unique desktop platform that connects and allows users to share storage worldwide.
world_art_subtitle:
Create, Sell and Collect
Extraordinary NFTs
world_art_description: World Art DEXPO NFT Marketplace is a platform built to gather like-minded creators, artists, and crypto enthusiasts...
metacon_description: Metacon is CONUN’s cryptocurrency wallet. With our wallet you can access the products within our ecosystem as well as...
advantage_desc_1: Through our distributed super computing platform you can get the power to run large projects, files, and applications affordably.
advantage_desc_2: By sharing your personal computing resources you become part of a P2P network where earning is easy.
advantage_desc_3: Become part of the CONUN network and you can benefit from our current and future blockchain-based projects.
dialog_desc: This project is currently under development. Please type your email address to be updated and you will be the first to know!
dialog_privacy: I want to receive notifications to my email whatever new updates are available from CONUN.
product_ocean_drive_desc:
OceanDrive is a unique desktop platform that connects
and allows users to share storage worldwide. It is a place to
share and explore all your assets quickly and conveniently.
product_info_ocean_drive_desc:
OceanDrive is secure and public decentralized storage. It means there is no centralized server that stores all the content. All content will
be stored by OceanDrive participants (which is nodes). As soon as a user connects to the OceanDrive network his/her computer will
become a OceanDrive network participant, and participants will choose which files to publish or store/backup. Content publishers and
storage providers will be rewarded by the network participants. All actions and transactions that occur on the OceanDrive network will be
stored on the Conun Private Blockchain, meaning all actions and transactions are immutable and secure.
product_ocean_drive_network_desc_1:
1. Join the network and become a storage provider.
2. Share your files with friends or backup your friends’ files.
product_ocean_drive_network_desc_2: 3. Rent someone your personal storage and get rewarded
product_ocean_drive_network_desc_3: 4. OceanDrive provides two different interfaces (HTTP/ P2P) for performing, sorting and querying on stream and are installed defined into application. Storage Gateway is responsible for handling requests by clients which connects to a remote OceanDrive node over HTTP.
product_ocean_drive_network_desc_4: 5. The network constantly verifies that storage providers are storing files correctly. All rewarding process is powered by CONUN blockchain.
product_ocean_drive_benefits_desc_1: Stores data separately instead of storing all data on one centralized server - eliminates need for cloud storage
product_ocean_drive_benefits_desc_2: Peer to peer marketplace - meaning unique products, worldwide assets, and increased availability of product.
product_ocean_drive_benefits_desc_3: Business opportunity for all users - rewards by sharing your personal idle resources and published private content.
product_ocean_drive_benefits_desc_4: OceanDrive was built for developers. So, if you are building an application, and NFT marketplace, or anything in between, our APIs and SDKs will provide you with powerful features.
product_dexpo_desc:
Great chance for artists to create their own items.
lowest fee for Buying and Selling NFTs
product_dexpo_art_desc:
World Art DEXPO NFT Marketplace is a platform built to gather like-minded creators, artists, and crypto
enthusiasts to create, trade, and share top NFTs.
product_dexpo_advantage_desc_1:
The same ecosystem as when users
receive rewards from CYCON COIN. Users can
use CYCON COIN to buy and sell NFTs.
product_dexpo_advantage_desc_2:
Most NFT exchanges use third-party
cloud storage. DEXPONFT uses
OceanDrive's distributed storage.
product_dexpo_advantage_desc_3:
Through an andition, all
information regarding the artists
will be checked and processed.
product_metacon_desc:
Metacon provides users with an environment for easy access and
use of decentralized finance. Enjoy the fast trading environment,
user-friendly interface, decentralized swap system, and DreamsCT!
product_metacon_info:
Metacon stores and transmits digital assets more securely. Meet the organized wallet through CONUN’s unique
blockchain technology! Metacon has its own swap function within the app. Through that function, you can apply for
DreamsCT games that only Metacon provides. Everyone’s hope and everyone’s wallet, Metacon.
download_text:
Hi there,
Thank you for subscribing to download.
We are super excited to have you on board, we know you’ll just love us.
Currently, this project is under development. But you will be the first person to be updated once it is ready to be downloaded!
If you have any questions or concerns please reach out to us at support-team@conun.io
Cheers,
CONUN Global

by applying the same

of the Korean lottery ticket.

to a price setting of

quick_swap_trades: Quick swap trades are available with our user-friendly interfaces
metacon_wallet_description: Metacon wallet applies a distributed storage solution that manages digital assets in a new way that has never been experienced before
dreamsct_description: You can apply for DreamsCT 7 times a week, once a day, and you can participate with CYCON worth 5,000 KRW per time.</br> DreamsCT ensures that forgery and falsification are not allowed under any circumstances through a smart contract-based application process.</br> through blockchain. DreamsCT games can be entered with Klaytn network-based CYCON tokens.
dreamsct_game_schedule:
DreamsCT game
every Sunday from 9am to
Saturday 6pm
install_metacon_wallet_app: Install Metacon wallet app and create a wallet
metacon_wallet_app_instruction:
Metacon wallet app must be
installed on your phone. Start by
creating or importing a wallet.
hold_cycon_requirement: Hold CYCON worth 5,000 KRW or more
cycon_wallet_requirement:
You must have CYCON worth
5,000 KRW or more in your
Metacon wallet. You can also
swap in your wallet.
phone_verification_instruction:
To start DreamsCT, you must
verify your phone number once
for the first time.​
age_restriction:
Minors under the age
of 20 are not allowed to
participate.​
participation_criteria:
Only those who meet the
above four criterias can
participate once a day.​​
golden_round_description:
Golden Round is operated every other week, and you can only participate if you have applied at least 4 times during the General
Rounds. Special rules apply to ensure unconditional winning. The criteria of the special rule are as follows. If there are many winners, the
winning CYCON will be given to the winners in form of 1/N.
winning_condition_1:
If 6 of the 6 numbers applied for are
the same as the winning number.
winning_condition_2:
If 1) is not applicable:
If 6 numbers you applied for are the
same among 7 numbers, including 6
winning numbers and 1 bonus number.
winning_condition_3:
If 1) and 2) are not applicable:
If 5 of the 6 numbers applied for are
the same as the winning number.
winning_condition_4:
If 1), 2) and 3) are not applicable:
If 5 of the 7 numbers, including 6
winning numbers and 1 bonus number,
are the same.
winning_condition_5:
If 1), 2), 3) and 4) are not applicable:
If 4 of the 6 winning numbers are the same.
winning_condition_6:
If 1), 2), 3), 4) and 5) are not applicable:
If 4 of the 7 numbers, including 6 winning
numbers and 1 bonus number, are the
same.
conclusion_golden_round: Golden Round application criteria is limited to those who have applied for at least 6 out of 10 cumulative rounds. The contents of this article are limited to the case where the first prize winner does not appear until after 10 rounds. If there is a first prize winner, the enforcement of this article shall be effected in the event that no winner emerges for 10 consecutive rounds. From the round in which the first prize inner does not appear, the 11th round is implemented.
cycon_accumulate_text:
At the end of each round, 10% of donation,
operation, and burn of CYCON are accumulated.

event_participation_instructions: How to participate in the event
auth_required: 3 authentication required: Phone number, email, and Google OTP

secure_page_screenshot: Secure page of phone number, email, and Google OTP screenshot.
same_phone_number: Phone number. [Must be the same phone number as screenshot in number 4.]
same_wallet_address: BitGet CYCON wallet address. [Must be the same address as screenshot in number 4.]
same_email_event: Please email us using the same email address you used on BitGet. [event@conun.io]

notice_text:
- Please send it by entering your personal information (name, wallet address)
accurately through the official Google form.
- If you participate in the event in an abnormal way, the win will be canceled.
- Winners will be announced on the Conun website and official SNS channel.
(The date of announcement of the winner may be delayed depending on our
circumstances.)
- We will not be responsible for the cancellation of the win due to incorrect input.
- You can only apply for the event once per e-mail.
- Contined for end of Ocean Drive Open Beta
